title: PortalDataset
description: A slightly more specialized dataset concept intended for the specific scope of the NF Portal; see https://nf.synapse.org/Explore/Datasets.

alternateName.description: An altername name that can be used for search and discovery improvement.
alternateName.title: Alternate Name

citation.description: identifies academic articles that are recommended by the data provider be cited in addition to the dataset itself.
citation.title: Citation

conditionsOfAccess.description: Additional requirements a user may need outside of Data Use Modifiers. This could include additional registration, updating profile information, joining a Synapse Team, or using specific authentication methods like 2FA or RAS. Omit property if not applicable/unknown.
conditionsOfAccess.title: User Specific Restriction

contributor.description: Institution or person responsible for collecting and managing the files and records in the dataset.
contributor.title: Contributor(s)

countryOfOrigin.description: Origin of individuals from which data were generated. Omit if not applicable/unknown.
countryOfOrigin.title: Country of Origin

creator.description: Properly formatted name of the organization or person that is creator of the dataset (e.g. "NF-OSI" or "Robert Allaway"), not an id. Most preferred is the project PI or data lead who's responsible for its conception and initial content creation.
creator.title: Creator

croissant_file_s3_object.description: Link to croissant file for dataset.
croissant_file_s3_object.title: Croissant File

dataType.description: Reflects the data types within the dataset.
dataType.title: Data Type

dataUseModifiers.description: List of data use ontology (DUO) terms that are true for dataset, which describes the allowable scope and terms for data use. Most datasets allow "General Research Use" unless otherwise specified.
dataUseModifiers.title: Data Use Modifiers

datePublished.description: Date data were published/available on Synapse.
datePublished.title: Date Published

description.description: Blurb for the dataset; should be no more than 500 characters.
description.title: Description

doi.description: The Digital Object Identifier (DOI) associated with the dataset, used for citation and persistent identification.
doi.title: doi

includedInDataCatalog.description: Link(s) to known data catalog(s) the dataset is included in.
includedInDataCatalog.title: Included In Data Catalog

individualCount.description: Number of unique individuals included in the dataset (whether as individual-level or as aggregate data). Omit if not applicable/unknown.
individualCount.title: Individual Count

license.description: Unless information for license is clear, this should default to UNKNOWN.
license.title: License

manifestation.description: Refers to the phenotype(s) studied in the dataset. Omit if not applicable.
manifestation.title: Manifestation(s)

measurementTechnique.description: What's used to generate data in dataset, typically referring to the assay. Omit if not applicable (e.g. for curated dataset such as a list compounds from a database or text extracted from Wikipedia).
measurementTechnique.title: Measurement Technique

series.description: Datasets may belong to a curated series. Should be assigned by staff only; omit property if not applicable/unknown.
series.title: Data Series

species.description: Species of the organism(s) from which the data were generated. Omit property if not applicable, such as for data like compounds or other non-biological data.
species.title: Species

specimenCount.description: Number of unique specimens included in the dataset. Omit if not applicable/unknown.
specimenCount.title: Specimen Count

studyId.description: Identifier for the study (project) from which the dataset was derived.
studyId.title: Study ID

subject.description: Applicable subject term(s) for dataset cataloging; use the Library of Congress Subject Headings (LCSH) scheme.
subject.title: Subject

visualizeDataOn.description: Link(s) to where data may be visualized in a separate application. Omit property if not applicable/unknown.
visualizeDataOn.title: Visualize Data On

yearProcessed.description: Year data were processed. Only for processed dataset type and when data series is "NF-OSI Processed Data"; omit if not applicable/unknown.
yearProcessed.title: Year Processed

PortalDataset.description: A slightly more specialized dataset concept intended for the specific scope of the NF Portal; see https://nf.synapse.org/Explore/Datasets.

alternateName.title: Alternate Name

citation.title: Citation

studyId.title: Study ID

subject.title: Subject
